welcome_message_body: Welcome to Legazpi City, where the perfect cone-shaped Mayon Volcano greets you with its majestic beauty. Discover the city's warm hospitality and rich Bicolano culture as you explore its stunning natural attractions and delicious local cuisine. Enjoy your stay!

restaurants.name: Uncle Ton's Brick Oven Pizza, Pasta & Grill
restaurants.description: Uncle Ton's Brick Oven Pizza, Pasta & Grill is a pizzeria located in Legaspi.
restaurants.address: 62 J.B. Alegre St, Tula-tula, 4500 Legazpi City, Legaspi City
